existing_features.title: Execute Deployment Checklist Step 6 by deploying the post-migration build to the network, then perform the checklist verifications: confirm deployment completes successfully, confirm the application is accessible at the deployment URL, and verify the in-app deployment readiness status (including access control initialization status and Stripe configuration status) as an admin user.

projectName: Execute Deployment Checklist Step 6: Deploy Post-Migration Build and Verify Readiness
